channel.title: Helianthus annuus on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Helianthus annuus on funPlantGenes

item.title: HaDREB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HaDREB2 Gene Name: DREB2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Helianthus annuus Functional Descriptions: The HaDREB2 transcription factor enhances basal thermotolerance and longevity of seeds through functional interaction with HaHSFA9.

item.title: HaHSFA9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HaHSFA9 Gene Name: heat stress transcription factor HSFA9 Genome: Species: Helianthus annuus Functional Descriptions: The HaDREB2 transcription factor enhances basal thermotolerance and longevity of seeds through functional interaction with HaHSFA9.
